metadata.Title: CVE-2012-5572 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
CRLF injection vulnerability in the cookie method (lib/Dancer/Cookie.pm) in Dancer before 1.3114 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary HTTP headers and conduct HTTP response splitting attacks via a cookie name, a different vulnerability than CVE-2012-5526.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-5572` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libdancer-perl - 1.3114+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libdancer-perl package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3114+dfsg-1').
